title: Ep. 5 - The Pro-Abortion Position is Disgusting and Ridiculous, and That’s How it Should Be Treated
description:
A conservative writer was fired from The Atlantic because in the past he said people who get abortions should be executed. Whatever you think about that position, it is far, far less offensive than supporting the mass execution of 60 million unborn babies.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
